mapper.select: SELECT e.ac_year, e.scholarship, e.research_score, s.user_id, s.card_id, s.name, s.school, s.grade, s.major FROM eval_result e JOIN student s ON e.card_id = s.card_id

SELECT mat_id, stu_id, ac_year, mat_type, output_name, output_type, category, ranking, level, DATE_FORMAT(output_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS output_time, DATE_FORMAT(submit_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS submit_time, eval_status, remark, name, file_url, eval_time, judge_id FROM research_achievements WHERE stu_id = #{stu_id}
